txt.en: You have been tasked with travelling to Minas Tirith (Midsummer) in Gondor and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Minas Tirith (Midsummer) for potential visitors.
Gondorians bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Khâtaphos believes that there may be some among the Gondorian residents of Minas Tirith who could use a tropical holiday.
'Into the hands of the enemy? You must be joking.'
'Bless you, what a wondeerful idea!'
Completed Gathering Guests: Minas Tirith (Midsummer)
'Are you daft? We would get killed by Corsairs!'
'I hate weddings anyway. Let's go!'
'In case you haven't noticed, I'm enjoying myself here.'
'Do you always ask strangers to run away with you? Go away.'
'Quick, let's leave before my mother sees.'
You see some potential visitors

'Gondor, our age-old enemies.... Do you know what is strange? I was raised to hate Gondor and its people. They and their ancestors from Númenor have caused much suffering in these lands. And yet, when I meet someone from Gondor and talk to them face-to-face, it turns out they are much like us! I do not like what their Kingdom has done, but I find it hard to blame the average citizen of Gondor for these things.

'Go to Minas Tirith and find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation to our beautiful island. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a visit, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us. Or... more poor, I suppose.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
You have found potential visitors in Minas Tirith (Midsummer). You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.
